content: वृष्णि {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} Heretical, heterodox. {@--2@} Angry, passionate. {@--3@} <ab>Ved.</ab> Raining. {%--<ab>m.</ab>%} {@--1@} A cloud. {@--2@} A ram. {@--3@} A ray of light. {@--4@} <ab>N.</ab> of an ancestor of Kṛṣṇa. {@--5@} <ab>N.</ab> of Kṛṣṇa. {@--6@} Of Indra. {@--7@} Of Agni. {@--8@} Air, wind. {@--9@} A heretic.
